titleStmt.title: A list of the names of the rebells, that were executed at Lyme, Bridport, Weymouth, Melcombe Regis, Sherbourn, Pool, Wareham, Exeter, Taunton, and several other places: Together with the names of those which were respited till further orders. Gathered out of several papers formerly printed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth]. Mallet, next door to Mr. Shiptons coffee-house near Fleet-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: This may be printed, R.P. April, the 1st. 1686.
A list of those to be executed.
Imperfect: copy at reel C11:3[17] torn at imprint, affecting place of publication.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: E[lizabeth]. Mallet, next door to Mr. Shiptons coffee-house
